title: Amazon's $110 tablet is great and terrible
description: Amazons Fire HD 8 tablet starts at $90 and goes up to $140 with a wireless charger bundle. Its a Fire OS tablet that runs Android apps, but what its really meant for is watching Prime video, calling on Alexa, and reading Kindle books. Its good at those things, but bad at everything else.
